d:testDescription.p: Tests basic mouse event handler and DOM manipulation through ECMAScript binding.

The test uses ECMAScript and initially displays a target with a message asking the user to click on the target. Once the user has done so, and if both event handling and DOM manipulation are supported, then the target and initial text are hidden and a text message indicating that the test was successful is displayed.

d:operatorScript.p: Load the test. Click on the blue square.

d:passCriteria.p: The test passes if, after clicking on the blue square, it and the instruction text "Click on the blue square" is removed and replaced with green text stating "Scripting Test Passed!".
